name: DomainResource
title: DomainResource
description: A resource that includes narrative, extensions, and modifierExtensions.

elements.name: DomainResource
elements.description: A resource that includes narrative, extensions, and modifierExtensions.

elements.name: id
elements.description: The logical id of the resource, as used in the URL for the resource. Once assigned, this value never changes.

elements.name: meta
elements.description: The metadata about the resource. This is content that is maintained by the infrastructure.

elements.name: implicitRules
elements.description: A reference to a set of rules that were followed when the resource was constructed, and which must be understood when processing the content.

elements.name: language
elements.description: The base language in which the resource is written.

elements.name: text
elements.description: A human-readable narrative that contains a summary of the resource and can be used to represent the content of the resource to a human.

elements.name: contained
elements.description: These resources do not have an independent existence apart from the resource that contains them - they cannot be identified independently, and nor can they have their own independent transaction scope.

elements.name: extension
elements.description: May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource.

elements.name: modifierExtension
elements.description: May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource and that modifies the understanding of the element that contains it and/or the understanding of the containing element's descendants.
